surveyDescription: In this survey, you're participating in an innovative system that lets everyone truly make an impact ‚Äì not just choose, but shape and rate ideas. The system combines research, statistics, and AI to identify broad consensus while preserving minority voices. Your participation here directly contributes to an accurate and meaningful picture of what truly matters.
contributorOnlyMessage: Thanks for contributing! Continue when ready.
thankYouForParticipating: Thank you for participating in this survey
emailSignupDescription: Enter your email to receive results when they're ready
noSurveysYet: You haven't created any surveys yet
confirmDeleteSurvey: Are you sure you want to delete this survey?

createSurveyDescription: Link multiple questions into a single survey
surveyTitlePlaceholder: Enter a title for your survey
surveyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this survey is about
showIntroTextDescription: Display an introductory message to participants on the welcome screen

languageSettingsDescription: Set the default language for this survey. RTL languages (Hebrew, Arabic) will automatically use right-to-left layout.
forceSurveyLanguageDescription: When enabled, all participants will see the survey in the selected language, overriding their browser preferences.
forceDocumentLanguageDescription: When enabled, all viewers will see the document in the default language regardless of their browser settings
noLanguageSelectedBrowserPreference: No language selected - will use browser preference

draftDescription: Survey is not visible to participants
closedDescription: Survey is closed, no new responses
closeWarning: Closed surveys cannot accept new responses. This action can be undone by changing the status back to Active.
testModeDescription: When enabled, new responses are marked as test data and filtered from statistics.
testModeWarning: Responses collected now will be marked as test data.
clearTestDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all test data? This action cannot be undone.
pilotDataDescription: Mark all data collected up to now as pilot/test data. This is useful when transitioning from a pilot phase to live data collection. Data can be unmarked later if needed.
markAllAsPilot: Mark All Current Data as Pilot
markAsPilotConfirm: This will mark all current live data as pilot/test data. The data will still exist but will be excluded from statistics and exports by default.
restorePilotDataConfirm: This will restore all retroactively marked pilot data back to live data. Only data that was manually marked as pilot will be restored.

landingHeroSubtitle: Build real consensus, not 51% majorities. Everyone's voice shapes the solution.
landingProblem1Text: Someone always loses. Half the population left unhappy.
landingProblem2Text: Someone else decides what you can choose between.
landingProblem3Text: Polarization wins votes. Unity doesn't get attention.
landingProblemSummary: Traditional voting creates winners and losers. We can do better.
landingStep1Text: Rate proposals on a spectrum from -1 (strongly disagree) to +1 (strongly agree). Your nuanced opinion matters.
landingStep2Text: Anyone can propose solutions. The best ideas rise based on collective consensus.
landingStep3Text: Real-time results show which ideas bring people together, not apart.
landingBenefit1Text: Consensus means solutions work for everyone, not just the majority.
landingBenefit2Text: No fixed options. Anyone can propose and refine ideas until we find what works.
landingBenefit3Text: The winning idea is the one that brings people together, not divides them.
landingBenefit4Text: Watch as consensus emerges. See how your input shapes the outcome.
landingQuote: We don't choose between existing options - we create better ones together.
landingCtaSubtitle: Join thousands of people creating solutions together
landingTerms: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service
landingInstitute: From the Institute for Deliberative Democracy
